game.name: MX vs ATV Legends
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: MX vs ATV Legends에서 자전거, ATV, UTV에 올라타 승리를 향해 질주하십시오! 광활한 오픈 월드에서 세계적으로 유명한 프로 라이더가 되는 데 따른 모든 위험과 보상을 경험할 수 있는 커리어 모드를 만나보세요. 나만의 오프로드 레이싱 전설이 되어보세요! 여러분의 시간이 왔습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Race your way to victory on bikes, ATVs and UTVs in MX vs ATV Legends! Featuring massive new open environments, plus a career mode that lets you experience all the risks and rewards of becoming a world-famous professional rider. Become an off-road racing legend in your own right! Your time is now!

reviewHighlights.text: Clean game, and as someone who drives bikes I really enjoy it. Also makes you miss the old ps2 games would recommend =)
Got the game on sale at 10$ That being said I think the game is worth what I paid. Theres a lot of content and fun once you learn the physics and flow...
